name: slobbery
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
unpleasantly wet, and containing a lot of saliva (= the liquid produced in your mouth): a big, slobbery kiss His slobbery bulldog is dozing and snoring loudly. See
slobber
More examplesFewer examplesCan you imagine anything more repulsive than a slobbery kiss from him?I had boyfriends who had sweaty palms and slobbery tongues. His slobbery lips were trembling with emotion.
